entry.title: LeNet - CNN in python Text Recognition
entry.content:
In this blog we will be discussing Text Recognition and going to implement a simple but revolutionary Convolutional Neural Network : LeNet.The LeNet architecture is simple and doesnot take very much computational power.It will run on the CPU.

We are going to implement it using Python and Keras.Keras is an...

entry.title: Object Tracking
entry.content: We are going to learn a simple object tracking technique using OpenCV python package. We know for better representation of color we use HSV(Hue-Saturation-Value) color format. Hue range is [0,179];Saturation range is [0,255] ; Value range is [0,255]. You can find the list of whole color conversion flags using the...

entry.title: Decision Trees
entry.content: Decision Trees are widely used models for classification as well as regression tasks. In this approach in order to distinguish between certain class a series of if/else questions are asked and based on the answers the items are classified.

entry.title: k-armed Bandit Problem and related algorithms
entry.content: In this blog we will be discussing about the k-armed bandit problem i.e. slot machines.We will be getting some rewards by pulling the lever of the machine which has (in this scenario) stationary probability distribution.Putting more simply,the reward will not change over time for the given slot machine.The reward is...
